name: Fright Night
description:
With Fright Night, you can experience the horror story with nerve-racking atmosphere. The story concentrates on the main protagonists who suddenly relives his memories, which he would rather not think about. Explore the locations, find story written out on papers and locate the keys that will let you into the next location.

As a matter of fact, it is the first project of this studio and we feel very proud to share it with the rest of the community.
